full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,ME MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'KHYER BDE BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(CES ME MCHOD BYA TSUL MDOR BSDUS BKRA SHIS DPAL 'BAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RANG GI SPOBS DPYOD LDAN DBU MDZAD DGE SLONG RDO RJE'I MING CAN NAS PHYOGS 'DIR ME MCHOD KYI SROL KUN TU DAR YANG, MCHOD THABS YID BRTAN DUNG BSHIG MI SNANG BAS KHUNGS LDAN 'KHYER BDE'I TE GZHIG CIS KYANG DGOS ZHES NAN TAN DU BSKUL BA LTAR TSAD THABS KYI DAM PA GONG MA'I MAN NGAG GI PHYAG GROL DANG SGO BSTUN TE, ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG SKYE 'GRO MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
